title: Stress Free, Furnished and Fun
posting_body: Furnished apartment.
EVERYTHING IS INCLUDED!
One huge benefit of using a short term rental from Blu Corporate Housing is that everything is included in the price.
All our rentals are fully furnished, decorated to a very high standard, include all appliances, everything you need in the kitchen and bathroom, even bed linens and more are included.
All you have to do is unpack your things!
Furnished apartment rentals are ideal for company travelers, insurance companies, healthcare organizations and families who need somewhere to stay for a while.
